sentences.en: " Major Jay Gatsby, " I read, " For Valour Extraordinary. "
sentences.cn: “ 杰伊-盖茨比少校, ” 我念道, “ 英勇过人 ”

sentences.en: At the summit the stamina and valour of our fighter pilots remained unconquerable and supreme.
sentences.cn: 最突出的是,我们的战斗机驾驶员们始终保持着不屈不挠的最大的毅力和勇气.

sentences.en: Discretion is the better part of valour.
He showed valour and skill on the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 他在战场上显得骁勇善战.

sentences.en: He was himself decorated for valour in the war.
sentences.cn: 他自己因在战争中的英勇表现而获得了勋章。

sentences.en: His valour in the war was seen by everybody.
sentences.cn: 他在战争中的英勇人所共见.

sentences.en: It held out with incredible valour.
sentences.cn: 它令人难以置信地英勇坚守.

sentences.en: It is Better to trust to valour than to luck.
That valour which is not founded on prudence calls rashness.
sentences.cn: 未经深思熟虑的勇武只能称作轻率.

sentences.en: The national struggle could only be sustained by the innate valour of the common people.
sentences.cn: 这一民族斗争只能靠着普通人民的固有的英勇精神支撑下去.

sentences.en: The time of trial will soon come; keep your valour till then.
sentences.cn: 考验的时刻就要到了, 你们留点力气到那时去耍吧.

sentences.en: Wherever true valour is found , true modesty will there abound.
sentences.cn: 真正的勇敢,都饱含谦虚.

sentences.en: Wherever valour true is found , true modesty will there abound . ( W . S . Gilbert )
sentences.cn: 真正的勇敢, 都包含谦虚. ( 吉尔伯特 )
